content.generated_hook: Tired of manual dev updates? I built an AI Autopilot that monitors my Git repo, generates viral tweets, & posts them for me. Shipping just got automated! ðŸš€ #BuildInPublic
content.generated_value: My new Autopilot system is live! It monitors Git commits, analyzes repo context, and uses AI to craft compelling, scheduled social media updates. Integrated with Twitter API, Supabase, & `TweetGenerator` for effortless #BuildInPublic updates. Dev marketing just got smarter.
generated_thread: Automating my #BuildInPublic updates! My new Autopilot monitors Git commits, analyzes context, & auto-generates engaging tweets. No more manual updates! Here's the core logic of how it processes changes & crafts content ðŸ‘‡

Central to this is the `TweetGenerator` component. It uses AI to analyze repo history, extract key features, and even suggests viral tweet inspirations. Plus, it handles code screenshots & image previews, making every post rich & engaging. #BuildInPublic

The system is fully functional, integrating with the Twitter API for seamless posting & Supabase for backend needs. It's built with a modular architecture for easy expansion & robust error handling. Next up: more analytics & community features! #BuildInPublic
